alert.note: Alert for Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 22 at 4:22AM MDT until October 24 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT SUNDAY NIGHT ABOVE 8500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 8500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight MDT Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
